messages.message:
Hey Team,

I noticed that for list and table fields, the results API provides the value as a string that in turn has a list of strings with escape characters.
This will be raised as a security concern by clients. API gateways could classify this as "SQL injection" attempts. Latest example being Intact

Ideally, an array field should be an array and not a text output.

I am just beginning to explore how we can make defined data types that are outputted. By doing this we can, ideally, move past the “TEXT” type catchall and have the returned values be formatted into the correct data structure.
